description_expanded: Mainstays Juicy Watermelon Single Wick Candle (20oz) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. A large jar candle with a single wick and a sweet, fruity Juicy Watermelon scent. Long-lasting fragrance for any room. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
